subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mike Trimboli had 17 points and 8 assists before crumpling to the floor with 19 seconds remaining last night as Vermont coasted to a 77-63 victory against No. 14 Boston College.
snippet: Mike Trimboli had 17 points and 8 assists before crumpling to the floor with 19 seconds remaining last night as Vermont coasted to a 77-63 victory against No. 14 Boston College.
